name: taskpad
description: This is a kind of a notepad

scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./web && BROWSER=none yarn start" "wait-on http://localhost:25554 && electron ."
scripts.build: cd web && yarn build && cd ../ && npx electron-builder --linux deb --dir
scripts.build:windows: cd web && yarn && yarn build && cd ../ && yarn && npx electron-builder --win
